We are working on a mini grammar for Skolt Sámi designed especially for users of Oahpa!-nuõrti.
The materials we have used include:

ul.li: Feist, T. 2010: A grammar of Skolt Saami. Manchester.
Moshnikoff, S. / Moshnikoff J. / Koponen 2009: Koltansaamen koulukielioppi. Inari.
Sammallahti, P. / Mosnikoff, J. 1991: Suomi-koltansaame-sanakirja. Utsjoki.

body.p: Here is a link to our paradigm generator where you can type in a word and get its various word forms.
So far our grammar contains the following chapters (we plan to write more):

ul.li:
Inflected words
Noun – Intro
Noun – Derivation (coming)
Noun – Inflection (coming)
Verb – Intro (coming)
Verb – Derivation (coming)
Verb – Inflection (coming)
Verb – Complex verb forms (coming)
Adjective – Intro (coming)
Adjective – Inflection (coming)

body.p: Note that parts of our resources are still in beta versions, which means that there may be errors in them. Feel free to use our feedback form to send us corrections and suggestions for improvement.
